title: ivana hiDakoNDu
sahitya:
ivana hiDakoNDu hOgelO jOgi


anupallavi

  iva namma mAta kELade puNDanAda


caraNam 1    AdutADuta pOgi nIralli muLugida beDavendare beTTa bennali hotta 
tADeya mEle tA dhAriNi negahida nODidavarige bAya teredanjisida
    caraNam 2    hullali viprana kaNNu tivida buddhi illendare kaili koDaliya piDida 
billu piDidu tAnu rakkasara konda ballida mAvana shirava cEdisida
    caraNam 3    battale kudureya hattabeDendare hattidanu Itanu candadinda 
bhaktavatsala shrI purandara viTTalana ettalAdaru koNDu hOgelo jOgi
